## PageBuilder class

PageBuilder is used to build a page from a PageInterface and return a BuildResultInterface with the result.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PageBuilder 
```

## Example

const pageBuilder = new PageBuilder(page); const result = pageBuilder.build(); if (result.success) { // do something with the result }
